metadata.synopsis: One-liner dialog for a circus ghoul, who sniffs customers entering the circus.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Use the debug book to got to act 3, wyrm's crossing, Circus of the Last Days. You will be teleported to directly outside the circus gates - click on the ghoul or the man next to get the checkpoint dialogue. After that, you can get these one-liners.

0.speaker: Benji
0.text: *Sniff.* Blood. In the CIRCUS? Without BENJI? Aw.
0.context: NodeContext: gutted to be missing out on the bloodshed

1.speaker: Benji
1.context: NodeContext: Llittle vbit scared of the player, wants them to leave.

2.speaker: Benji
2.text: No like you. *Sniff.* No like your smell.
